name: Neon (itch) (Maxplay)
description:
Born from a quick game jam in a videogame school in Japan, Neon is meant to be a simple local-multiplayer versus game with simple controls.

For each player 2 keys will be assigned, one to shoot and the other to rotate.

To fully enjoy this game just keep in mind those advices :

- Beware of friendly fire -

- Use shot recoil to move -

- Your shield deflects shots -

- Hold the shoot key for a charged shot -

Thanks for reading (yeah, you deserve recognition) and enjoy.
